title: Relationship Between Work Stress and Body Mass Index Among 45,810 Female and Male Employees
display_name: Relationship Between Work Stress and Body Mass Index Among 45,810 Female and Male Employees

raw_affiliation_strings: Dr. Kouvonen was working as a Visiting Research Fellow at the Institute of Work, Health and Organisations, the University of Nottingham when preparing this paper.
